meanings.definition: A semiconductor device that converts light into an electrical current.
meanings.sent1: Photodiodes are small devices that turn light into electricity.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use photodiodes in cameras to capture images.
meanings.sent3: The photodiodes at the party were so bright, they lit up the room!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like photodiodes, lighting up the darkness of his day.
meanings.sent5: The photodiodes hummed softly as they transformed sunlight into power.

meanings.definition: A type of photodetector that is used to detect and measure light.
meanings.sent1: Photodiodes help in measuring the brightness of a room.
meanings.sent2: The security system uses photodiodes to sense any movement.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the photodiodes, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like photodiodes, always aware of the slightest changes.
meanings.sent5: The photodiodes blinked rapidly, signaling the presence of light.
